title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a REST/CLI API that lets you pull, run and chat with models like Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. on macOS, Linux and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and async helpers for the Ollama REST API; installable via PyPI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers with fetch-based streaming.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package giving LLM, embedding and chat interfaces backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that clones ChatGPT look-and-feel; supports multi-user, RAG, OpenAI-compat endpoints.

title: continue/continue
summary: VS Code & JetBrains plugin that adds local LLM coding assistant; ships with Ollama preset.

title: jmorganca/ollama-inspector
summary: Minimal Electron tray app to monitor/download/manage Ollama models from the menubar.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-copilot.vim
summary: Community PR/patch enabling Copilot.vim to use Ollama backends instead of GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot template that streams responses from Ollama with Tailwind styling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama REST API with Jackson serialization and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI wrapper that adds fzf model picker, conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed requests/responses and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama answers into guild channels with slash commands.

title: ollama-nvidia-docker
summary: Official container images with CUDA support and multi-arch manifests for easy GPU usage.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async client for Ollama API with Tokio.

title: ollama-datasets
summary: Curated collection of Modelfiles and datasets optimized for fine-tuning with Ollama.

title: reddit/r/ollama
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tips, custom Modelfiles and troubleshooting Ollama setups.

title: ollama-hackernews-discussion
summary: Hacker News thread discussing Ollama v0.1.30 release with M-series GPU support.
